text: The Hyundai ST1 is a electric Light commercial vehicle made by Hyundai since 2024. == History and Features == The Hyundai ST1 was launched in March 2024 the name "ST1" means "Service Type 1" Hyundai describes the vehicle as a "purpose-bulit vehicle" (PBV) the dashbord and the cabin of the ST1 are from the Hyundai Staria. It has a 76.1 kWh battery that has 160 KW (215 hp) the standard cargo version has a range of 317 km (197 mi) and the refrigerated cargo has a range of 298 km (185 mi). == Markets == The Hyundai ST1 is sold only in South Korea but its sold in Europe under the Iveco brand as the Iveco eMoovy. == References == ST1 Category:2020s automobiles
title: Hyundai ST1
